catalog_script_client.name: getAvailableSeatTypes

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_41a1d50dc3649610fbf6b8e1b40131a1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Seats Configuration">5ab1a5f3c31c9690fbf6b8e1b40131e0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0f84a97bc35c9690fbf6b8e1b401314f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>getAvailableSeatTypes</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    g_form.clearOptions("seat_type");
    var seatTypes = new GlideAjax("SeatTypes");
    seatTypes.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAvailableSeatTypes');
    seatTypes.addParam('sysparm_theater', newValue);
    seatTypes.getXMLAnswer(populateSeats);

    function populateSeats(response) {
        var set = new Set();
        var seats = JSON.parse(response);
        for (var i = 0; i < seats.length; i++) {
            if (set.has(seats[i].sys_id) == false) {
                g_form.addOption("seat_type", seats[i].sys_id, seats[i].name);
            }
            set.add(seats[i].sys_id);
        }
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-08 05:47:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>41a1d50dc3649610fbf6b8e1b40131a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getAvailableSeatTypes</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Movie Ticket Reservation App" source="x_1509691_movie_0">5a9e8f52c3d89610fbf6b8e1b401316e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Movie Ticket Reservation App">5a9e8f52c3d89610fbf6b8e1b401316e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_41a1d50dc3649610fbf6b8e1b40131a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-08 05:47:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
